Catalan: <s>Assegurar-se de gaudir d'un son de bona qualitat durant prou temps hauria de ser un «arma secreta» dels estudiants per combatre l'estrès, el cansament i l'ansietat, va afegir, fins i tot per evitar guanyar pes, ja que la privació del son posa el cervell en mode d'inanició i fa que els estudiants sempre tinguin gana.</s>
English: <s>To assure oneself of enjoying a good quality sound for a long time would be a "secret weapon" for students to combat stress, tiredness and anxiety, and to avoid having to listen to music, since it is known that the lack of sound puts the brain in a state of hunger and makes the students always have the desire to listen to music.</s>

Catalan: <s>Christion Abercrombie, rerelínia dels Tennessee State Tigers s'ha sotmès a una operació d'emergència després de patir una lesió al cap dissabte en la derrota per 31-27 contra els Vanderbilt Commodores, segons informació de Mike Organ, del Tennessean.</s>
English: <s>Christion Abercrombie, the starting quarterback for the Tennessee State Tigers, has been ruled out for the remainder of the season after suffering a knee injury in the 31-27 loss to the Vanderbilt Commodores on Saturday, according to Mike Organ, of the Tennessean.</s>
Christion Abercrombie, the starting quarterback for the Tennessee State Tigers, has been ruled out for the remainder of the season after suffering a knee injury in the 31-27 loss to the Vanderbilt Commodores on Saturday, according to Mike Organ, of the Tennessean.
Abercrombie was injured in the second quarter of Saturday's game when he was sacked by Vanderbilt defensive end Kyle Woestmann. Abercrombie remained on the ground for several minutes before being carted off the field.
Abercrombie, a redshirt junior, has started all 10 games for the Tigers this season. He has completed 62.5 percent of his passes for 1,647 yards and 11 touchdowns. He has also rushed for 200 yards and three touchdowns.
The Tigers (2-8, 1-5 OVC) will play their final game of the season on
